title: Tryndamere deserves compensation for being so kitable
body:
Here are some of my ideas for making Tryndamere viable again:

* His autoattacks apply a 1 second silence, so if the Tryndamere has the skill to get into melee range, he won't be kited so hard.
* Tryndamere's spin has no cooldown while Tryndamere's ultimate is in use. This will seperate the good, opportunistic Tryndamere players from the bad ones.
* Tryndamere's slow should slow even if they're facing Tryn, if he casts it while his ultimate is in use.
* Tryndamere should gain 1 MS for every point of rage he has.
* Tryndamere gains tenacity based on his critical chance. 1% critical chance = 1% tenacity

What does Gameplay think about these fair Tryndamere buffs to make him viable again?
